author: joeyaiello
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [x] Resolves #1331.
- [x] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [x] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

I've merged a few documents here, reworked our `CONTRIBUTING.md` by removing some links to stub docs that I believe are now unnecessary (given the depth of the various `building` docs), and added some more basic info to the label and PR docs. 

Next, I'll be filing an issue on the governance docs and writing up a first draft.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Just updated my branch to reflect the fixes. I'll merge it later today if no one else has objections

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
:shipit: 
You may want to squash your commits.

title: Joey/refactor docs
